name: motorised wheelchair
description: Elderly is staying in a rental flat and primary caregiver for her granddaughter(F/10). He has mobility difficulty and requires the assistance of a motorized wheelchair to commute safer with the limited assistance of his caregiver. He faces financial constraints and is unable to afford getting a wheelchair.(Xin mo)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Wheelchair battery
description: Client is a 49-year-old woman living with her wheelchair-bound husband (M/67). Client is unemployed and does not receive any financial support from her family. Her husband is retired, and they have been surviving on his monthly CPF payouts. Her husband’s battery for his motorised wheelchair is faulty and they have not been able to replace it due to financial constraints. A donation of a wheelchair battery will be greatly appreciated. Thank you. (Liyana)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Wheelchair
description: Client releasing from Prison but with mobility issues. Requires a wheelchair to move about at ease. Unable to purchase one and will need it upon his release.

contact.org: Fei Yue Community Service - Family Resource Centre
contact.name: Janet Liam Hui Hui

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description: Single elderly male who is a stroke survivor with left side contractures of the past 7 years. He lives in a rental flat that has been infested with bed bugs. He is not on good terms with his CO-tenant and relies heavily on his motorised wheelchair to go out of home to avoid conflict at home. He needs to have the motorised wheelchair before fumigation can be done to his flat.

name: Elevating Footrest and Detachable Armrest Wheelchair
description: 8 years old child who was diagnosed with cancer had just undergone a surgery at the leg and requires a wheelchair with detachable armrest and an elevating footrest.

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Motorized wheelchair
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr A, has recently been diagnosed with decompensated cardiac failure (disorder). The client ambulates around the community with his manual wheelchair, but due to his weak heart condition, it has affected his arms’ strength to push himself around. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a motorized wheelchair, foldable if possible, to assist Mr A on ambulating around the community. 
   
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Ave 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is not mobile due to the multiple health conditions, including a tumour in her knee. Being a mother of young children, it has been challenging for her to manage the household by herself. Her husband helps out at home but recently, he was diagnosed with arthritis and this had also affected his mobility. Due to the couple’s poor health, they have not been able to run errands and they are also not able to send their 4-year-old to school. There are concerns that the child’s development may be affected if she continues to not have the opportunity to attend school. There are no breadwinners in the family due to their health issues. They are heavily dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office to make ends meet. 

Mobility scooter (preferably for two passenger so that client’s husband can send their child to school)

name: Adult Diapers
description: Client is wheelchair bound and stays in a 1-room rental flat with 3 children. Client's son is only able to work part-time as he has to help with the caregiving of client and for sending client to medical appointments. Client's daughter is in her final year of ITE. The family is reliant on financial assistance to meet their basic needs. In recent months, client has developed a medical condition that has caused an increase in the usage of adult diapers throughout the day and night. Client is seeking donation for adult diapers that are in Size L, tape. For further liaison, kindly contact me at 98598768, thank you!

name: COVID ART TEST KIT
description: We are appealing FOR A COVID 19 ART TEST KIT for a low income client who need to do ART TEST twice a week due to is part time status his company did not provide him with the kits and he have to fork up his own money to do so due to hs financial constrains is not able to do so

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Maggie Gan

name: Standard Q ART Test Kits (50x and more)
description:
For low income families with children ages between 5 - 18 years old.
With more testing require during the current phrase, the low income families are experiencing difficulties in affording more test kits, especially families with many children. Hence, need support in donations of Standard Q ART Test Kits. Donors can get in touch with me on delivering the test kits to our office at (20 Lengkok Bahru, Playground Block, #03-02, Singapore 159053). Thank you!

name: Blood Glucose Meter
description: Client is an elderly person with multiple medical conditions. She is unemployed and is unable to afford a blood sugar measuring meter to monitor her blood sugar level

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: Standing fan
description: Client is the sole breadwinner supporting her family of 7 (5 young children). Client and her family are living in rental flat and client is a low wage income earner. Client requires a standing fan for her living room as her current one has spoilt.

contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: Dryer
description: Family of 3 with 2 school-going children require a clothes dryer.

name: Fridge (2 or 3 door, top and bottom)
description: Client (F/48), lives alone at home. Require new fridge donation, as current fridge has been damaged. She likes to cook and having a new fridge will help to ensure her groceries are fresh. Will like to have a fridge that is 2 or 3 doors. Do contact me at 8628 1578. Thanks!

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

name: Fridge (2 or 3 door, top and bottom)
description:
Client, living in rental flat alone, aged 48, requires fridge at home. She likes to cook, but her previous 2nd hand fridge has broke down. 

Will like to seek for new fridge donation. 2 or 3 doors preferred. Kindly contact me at 8628 1578.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

name: Induction stove (electric)
description:
Client is a single mother to her 2-year-old son and is about 8-month pregnant to her unborn child. She was unable to continue with her work as a service crew due to the restrictions in dining in at F&B then and her frequent experiences of morning sickness. She attempted work again recently to keep up with her expenses. However, she had to stop due to the fatigue given the work demands.

Client cooks at home to save on food expenses. However, her frying pan and induction stove overheated, creating black residues on her frying pan and induction stove. Therefore, a donation of frying pan and induction stove (preferably from Halal sources), would be greatly appreciated. Thank you very much. (Nasuha)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Front loading Washing Machine
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm See Mei Ting, was diagnosed with end stage cancer. She is frail, has chronic back issues and is unable to ambulate well. Mdm See still hand washes her clothes, which worsens her back issues. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a front-loading washing machine to aid Mdm See. 
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Tan Jin Le at 8828 6171. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the items to the client’s home directly at Blk 75 Bedok North Road. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Vacuum cleaner
description: Client is living in a 2 room HDB rental with her husband, son, grandson and two young granddaughter. Her daughter and son-in-law are incarcerated thus, she and her husband have to care for their grandchildren. Client is the sole breadwinner of the family as her husband is unwell and also has to be the caregiver for their grandchildren. Client is struggling financially. Client requested for a vacuum cleaner to assist with her cleaning of her home.

name: Clothes Dryer
description: Organisation helping pregnant women with unsupported pregnancies looking for a dryer for their premises.

name: handheld vacuum cleaner
description: Single unemployed mother with 3 children living in a 2-room rental flat. Requesting for a handheld vacuum cleaner for convenience in cleaning her home.

name: Ceiling fan
description: Clt is single parent to 2 young kids (a toddler and a baby) and is pregnant with 3rd child due in Jan 2022. Clt is main caregiver and unable work. Clt needs a ceiling fan for her rental flat as her kids and herself can't take hot weather.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Christina Lim

name: Daikin mc30vvm-h air purifier (or similar)
description: Client is diagnosed with multiple myeloma and is on treatment. She's advised that her space has to be clean and clutter free as she is going for her bone marrow transplant soon. Thus, having an air purifier will help her in keeping her environment clean. However, as she's financially needy, she is unable to afford it.

name: Hot & Cold Water Dispenser
description:
Client is a household of 6 family members. 
The sole-income earner takes on a low pay and the family is dependable on SSO Comcare financial assistance.
The main caregiver is facing health issues and is unable to support the family's financial situation apart from the caregiving of the children. 
Having to struggle with basic needs, the family do not have additional finances to afford the purchase a hot & cold water dispenser.

name: vertical steamer
description: Client is from a low-income family with 4 children. The family is facing financial strains as the wife lost her job due to coivd-19 and the husband has recently job transition to a lower-paying job. They are looking for a vertical iron/steamer however they are unable to afford it. It would be helpful for the family to receive one. Thank you!

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Resource Fruit Flavored Beverage (Orange)
description: Pt, 70 years old, bilateral amputee, living alone in a HDB 1 room rental flat. She has poor appetite and assessed to be malnutritioned by our dietitian. Was unable to tolerate other supplements but appears receptive towards fruit resource supplement. Although pt has been on fruit resource for the past 4 months, meal intake still remains poor and blood test results suggest that she would still require the fruit based supplement.    Apart from daily expenses, children are unable to afford additional expenses because they are low income earners and staying in a 1 room rental flat. Would like to seek donation of 2 months' supply (48 packets) of Resource Fruit Flavoured Beverage (orange flavour)

name: Nan Supreme Infant Formula
description: Young family has a 1 year old son and just delivered another baby last month. Children's father is 22 years old and enlisted into NS early this year. Requesting for milk powder support to ease financial strain. Children currently consume Nan Supreme milk powder as children react negatively to other brands. Infant formula required: Stage 1 and State 2.

name: Sanitizer Spray Gun for low-income family (COVID+)
description: Family of 10 with limited income has been diagnosed with COVID-19. There are 4 young children in the family, and family plans to sanitize the home environment after the entire family is recovered. (Example: https://shopee.sg/%F0%9F%94%A5SG-Ready-Stocks%F0%9F%94%A5-Sanitizer-Spray-Disinfection-Machine-Blue-Ray-Disinfectant-Spray-Gun-UV-Nano-Atomizer-K5-i.263720366.9059674663?sp_atk=bc24fc1b-348d-4385-8728-edcfdf8c9fc1). name: Household essentials
description:
Christmas hamper collection drive. We are preparing to pack and distribute 40 sets of hampers to stay-alone elderly, or low-income families as part of our year-end festivities. Please contact Jiemei @ 81266854 or Clarissa @ 91271945 for more information.

Items required:
Hand soap
Dishwashing liquid
Dish sponge
Gloves
Dettol wet wipes

B) Fresh:Fruits (banana, red apple, rockmelon, watermelon, mango) – any amount	any fruits any amount. C) Wet/frozen: Chicken nuggets (brnad: freezepak) - 2 x 1kg, Fresh chicken pieces - 2 sets of chicken pieces, Fishball	dodo - 2 packets, Crabsticks - 2 packets. The items will be directly delivered to beneficiary's place and please contact us for delivery details (email:dik@childrensociety.org.sg, contact: 9436 7401). name: Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula (2-3 bottles)

Client (28/M) resided with his wife (34/F) and 2 sons (3/M and 3/M). Client is currently employed as a food delivery man and wife employed as a part-time clinic assistant. Family is also supported by SSO@Woodlands for ComCare Assistance but still struggles to cope due to monthly repayment of debs previously incurred. Client's income was recently further impacted due to severe eczema experienced that led him to be hospitalized, affecting his ability to maintain employment. Client wishes to support the family in greater capacity but identifies limitations in doing so currently due to his mental health concerns. Client is unable to acquire support from her family of origin due to history of strained relationships. Client shared on family's attempt in coping with difficulties encountered but faces financial difficulties, especially in the purchasing of sons' diapers. We would like to seek donations for 4 Drypers/Huggies diapers of size XL and 2 Drypers/Huggies diapers of XXL for the two sons in addressing their sanitary needs and Pediasure Milk Formula and Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula for children's development consumption due to family's financial struggles. Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn.
